DOC.brief_summary: The investigator study effect paracetamol steady state metabolism lamotrigine 12 healthy male volunteer . Subjects receive lamotrigine , slowly titrate 25 mg daily 100 mg daily 28 day . On day 36 , full plasma urine PK sample draw . On day 37-40 subject co-administered 1 gr paracetamol 4 time daily . On day 40 sampling repeat . Primary outcome parameter Lamotrigine AUC coadministration paracetamol .
DOC.brief_title: Interaction Between Paracetamol Lamotrigine : A Clinical Interaction Study
DOC.criteria: Healthy medication use Informed consent Allergy paracetamol lamotrigine
